spec_data.Name: perl-Syntax-Keyword-Junction
spec_data.Description:
This is a lightweight module which provides 'Junction' operators, the most
commonly used being any and all. Inspired by the Perl6 design docs,
<http://dev.perl.org/perl6/doc/design/exe/E06.html>.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:18:17 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl6 style Junction operators in Perl5
